name: MakeSweet!
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `makesweet` cog! Keep in mind you need to compile ``reanimator``by yourself! The version I've included is not guaranteed to work on your machine <https://github.com/paulfitz/makesweet/tree/master/src> 
 Also, please install reanimator dependencys ``sudo apt-get install libgd-dev libzzip-dev libopencv-highgui-dev libopencv-videoio-dev libjsoncpp-dev libprotobuf-dev``
author: Glas
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
